name: gillicons
description: Gillicons is a set of 3 open-source libraries, containing svg icons, angular component and react component to use these icons.
author: Gillian Perard <gillian.perard@gmail.com>

scripts.install:deps: yarn && yarn --cwd packages/gillicons && yarn --cwd packages/angular-gillicons && yarn --cwd packages/react-gillicons && yarn --cwd packages/react-gillicons/lib
scripts.build:libs: yarn --cwd packages/gillicons lib && yarn link:gillicons:angular && yarn link:gillicons:react && yarn --cwd packages/angular-gillicons lib  && yarn --cwd packages/react-gillicons lib && yarn link:react-gillicons
scripts.lint: yarn --cwd packages/gillicons lint && yarn --cwd packages/angular-gillicons lint && yarn --cwd packages/react-gillicons lint
scripts.publish:libs: yarn build:libs && npm publish packages/gillicons/dist && npm publish packages/angular-gillicons/dist/angular-gillicons && npm publish packages/react-gillicons/lib/dist
